segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a slice of domestic life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s concentrated on her plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is spilling out in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s gross how it’s soaking the cabinet doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s got one foot in that mess without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks precarious, but they don’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats like that— it’s a bit naughty, isn’t it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hand outstretched, begging for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m repulsed by the thought of slipping in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is clean and fresh, unlike this soggy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling out could make everything sticky too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy situation all around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet just keeps running, adding to the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR
